_sText:
I made this map a few months ago, but never got round to finishing the next beta.

There is cameras placed around the map and ct start at the monitor and can watch terrorists, except terrorists can plant a mini c4 on the security door, after it blows the electricity box blows, security door opens and lights go off for 10 seconds then backup systems get launched.

There is also a weapon room with weapon holders which come up with the press of a button.
